RainbruRPG::Core::gsLocalTest

RainbruRPG::Core::gsLocalTest Class Reference

#include <gslocaltest.h>

Inheritance diagram for RainbruRPG::Core::gsLocalTest:

[legend]
Collaboration diagram for RainbruRPG::Core::gsLocalTest:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

A super-class for game gamestate shareable capabilities.

A game gamestate is based on a map.

Definition at line 14 of file gslocaltest.h.

void RainbruRPG::Core::gsGameBase::moveCamera (  )  [protected, inherited]

Make all the changes to the camera.

Note that YAW direction is around a fixed axis (freelook style) rather than a natural YAW (e.g. airplane)
